dct_description_sm: Map of Africa showing Portuguese, Spanish, French, British, Dutch and Danish colonial interests.
Shows portions of the eastern coastlines of North America and Brazil, and islands in the Atlantic and Indian Oceans including the Canary Islands, St. Helena, Madagascar, Mauritius and the Seychelles.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 inset maps: Die SÃ¼dspitze von Afrika [showing the routes taken by travellers Lichtenstein and Campbell] -- Die Capstadt und Umgegend.
3 bar scales on map, given in "Geogr. Meil.," "See Meilen," and "Engl. See M."
dct_spatial_sm: Good Hope, Cape of (South Africa : Cape)
